children.subject:
For starters, anyone can send me their resume and/or Linkedin profile. I think it's important to get these reviewed by multiple people, and I can be 1 resource. Give me at least 1 week to respond to each email, and if I don't respond, send a follow up reply :)

faridwaziri@berkeley.edu

history.content:
Hey everyone,

I have no idea if this will work, but lets try. There's resources like Career Center, UPE/HKN, and your friends. With that being said, perhaps we can form a little community on this thread and help each other with peer reviewing resumes.

If you're interested in getting your resume checked by peers, post on a follow up with the resume. If you don't want to be anonymous, you can also send email. If not, make sure you put placeholder data for personal information on the resume.

If you're interested in helping people with resumes non anonymously, you can also post follow up with your email.

Again, I have no idea if this will work or if this is in demand, but i'm going to try if it means someone gets their resume improved :)
history.subject: Resume Critique/Praise Thread
